content.query:
-- Create a stored procedure for storing the scoring script.
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.predict_rentals
AS
BEGIN
-- Select input scoring data and assign aliases.
WITH InputData AS
(
    SELECT
        [season],
        [mnth],
        [holiday],
        [weekday],
        [workingday],
        [weathersit],
        [temp],
        [atemp],
        [hum],
        [windspeed]
    FROM [dbo].[weather_forecast]
)
-- Using T-SQL Predict command to score machine learning models. 
SELECT *
FROM PREDICT (MODEL = (SELECT [model] FROM dbo.rental_prediction_model WHERE [ID] = 'rental-prediction-model:1'),
              DATA = InputData,
              RUNTIME = ONNX) WITH ([variable_out1] [real])
END
GO

-- Execute the above stored procedure.
EXEC dbo.predict_rentals
